General.Name: Kingsemi Co Ltd
General.Description: KINGSEMI Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of semiconductor-specific equipment, integrated circuit production equipment, testing equipment, and other electronic equipment in China. Its products include photolithography process coating and developing equipment, single-chip wet process equipment, and single-wafer wet processing equipment. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.
